question: How long does website design take?
answer:
Typical projects take 4-8 weeks from start to launch, depending on complexity and scope. We provide detailed timelines during the discovery phase.
We work with various platforms including WordPress, custom CMS solutions, and modern frameworks. We recommend the best option based on your specific needs and technical requirements.
